articles.title: PFE's Oncology & Obesity Pipeline Position It for Post-LOE Growth
articles.mainIdea: PFE's Oncology & Obesity Pipeline Position It for Post-LOE Growth
articles.summary: Zacks: PFE's Oncology & Obesity Pipeline Position It for Post-LOE Growth. Pfizer faces revenue pressure from 2026-2030 LOEs but is betting on a strengthened oncology and obesity pipeline to fuel sustainable post-LOE growth. Related tickers mentioned: MRK, PFE.

articles.summary: Zacks: Are You a Value Investor? This 1 Stock Could Be the Perfect Pick. The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.
